Formula: \left( {a \times b} \right) \times c = a \times \left( {b \times c} \right) = a \times b \times c

Description: Fractional Exponent to Fractional Root Relationship

Formula: \left( {a + b} \right)\left( {c + d} \right) = ac + ad + bc + bd
x^2 + x\left( {a + b} \right) + ab = \left( {x + a} \right)\left( {x + b} \right)

Description: Square of a First Order Polynomial

Formula: a\sqrt b \pm c\sqrt b = \left( {a \pm c} \right)\sqrt b
